Articles.Content:
So heres something that might or might not interest you, its basically a Tupolev TU-154 replika that i made since its one of my personal favourite passenger aircrafts in terms of looks. After building this i tought to myself that this looks a bit too bland so why not give a go at creating some airline colours of my own (aka some stripes made out of firespitter biplane ailerons and letters made using landing skids). The aircraft itself feels and flyes very good, its responsive and provides a very smooth flight in good hands (you dont want a bunch of filled up barf-bags after the filght ).

So here are some picks of TAL (Trans oceanic airlines or something like that) flight 0001 and the test flight.

Some bit of test flying to see that the aircraft can be sertified for commercial use .

After the testing was done and the aircraft type was cleared for service i tought that it might be a nice idea to fly to the island airfield and back .

And here we are, Safely back home redying for another flight.

Mods used: KAX, KAX expansion, B9, Procedual wings mod, firespitter and Flag Decals (v.2.3)

So i hope you enjoyed this little aircraft of mine and i hope this has given ideas for you to maby try to make your own airline colours in the future .

Here are some links to my other passenger aircraft projects:

JU-52 replika:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/136727-Junkers-JU-52-Iron-Annie

K-1011 SST-Klipper: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/136520-Koeing-K-1011-SST-Klipper

Some random planes:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/136613-Some-noteworthy-passenger-planes-from-my-collection-%28747-707-AWACS-777ish-DC-9-ish-aircraft-etc%29

Edited October 24, 2015 by kapteenipirk
mods list

well done, like the paint job!

what mods did you use for passenger and nose section?

built a smaller tu154 ages ago.

Thanks:). The cockpit and tail are from the KAX pack Kerbal Aircraft Expansion (KAX) and the passenger fuselage section is from the FantomWorks KAX Part Pack.

Edited May 5, 2021 by Snark
Link to defunct website removed by moderator
